Definition at line 519 of file context.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $ValidationScript = explode( ";" , $ValidationScript );
                        
                        foreach( $ValidationScript as $vs )
                        {
                              $Pair = explode( ":" , $vs );
                              
                              switch( $Pair[ 0 ] )
                              {
                                    case( 'login_exists' ):return( $this->custom_validation_login_exists( $Pair ) );
                                    case( 'login_does_not_exist' ):return( $this->custom_validation_login_does_not_exist( $Pair ) );
                                    case( 'page_exists' ):return( $this->custom_validation_page_exists( $Pair ) );
                                    case( 'page_does_not_exist' ):return( $this->custom_validation_page_does_not_exist( $Pair ) );
                                    case( 'captcha' ):return( $this->custom_validation_captcha( $Pair ) );
                                    
                                    default:throw( new Exception( 'Undefined predicate '.$Pair[ 0 ] ) );
                              }
                        }
                        
                        return( true );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

                  try
                  {
                        $Security = get_package( 'security' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
                        $Captcha = get_package( 'captcha' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
                        
                        $Result = $Captcha->validate_captcha( $Security->get_p( 'captcha' , 'command' , rand() ) , $Options );

                        {

execute ( $  Options,
$  Owner 
)

Function starts controller/view.

Parameters:
$Options - Execution parameters.
$Owner - Object of the class wich provides all handlers.
Returns:
True if the contoller/view started correctly, false otherwise.
Exceptions:
Exception An exception of this type is thrown.
Author:
Dodonov A.A.

validating form data

all validations were passed so start execution

validation was not passed so launch error processing script

Definition at line 942 of file context.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $this->Trace->start_group( "Context::execute for class \"".get_class( $Owner )."\"" );

                        if( $this->process_call_params_filter( $Options ) === false )return( false );
                        
                        if( $this->process_get_post_filter( $Options ) === false )return( false );
                        
                        if( $this->process_permits_filter( $Options ) === false )return( false );
                        
                        if( $this->process_permits_validation( $Options ) === false )return( false );
                        
                        if( $this->section_exists( 'get_post_validation' ) )
                        {
                              $GetPostValidation = $this->get_section( 'get_post_validation' );
                        }

                        if( $this->section_exists( 'get_post_validation' ) === false || 
                              $this->Security->validate_fields( $GetPostValidation ) === true )
                        {
                              if( $this->process_custom_validation( $Options ) === false )return( false );

                              if( $this->process_custom_validation_func( $Options ) === false )return( false );
                        
                              $FuncName = $this->get_section( 'success_func' );
                              
                              if( $FuncName === '_std_redirect' )
                              {
                                    $RedirectUrl = $this->get_section( 'redirect_url' );
                                    
                                    $FunctionBody = 'return( _std_redirect( "'.$RedirectUrl.'" , $OwnerObject ) );';
                                    
                                    $NewFunc = create_function( '$OwnerObject' , $FunctionBody );
                                    
                                    $NewFunc( $Owner );
                              }
                              else
                              {
                                    if( method_exists( $Owner , $FuncName ) === false )
                                    {
                                          throw( 
                                                new Exception( "Method \"$FuncName\" was not found in class ".get_class( $Owner ) )
                                          );
                                    }
                                    
                                    $FunctionBody = 'return( $OwnerObject->'.$FuncName.'( $Options ) );';
                                    $NewFunc = create_function( '$OwnerObject , $Options' , $FunctionBody );
                                    
                                    if( $NewFunc( $Owner , $Options ) !== false )
                                    {
                                          if( $this->section_exists( 'cleanup_fields' ) )
                                          {
                                                $Items = explode( ',' , $this->get_section( 'cleanup_fields' ) );
                                                foreach( $Items as $key => $value )
                                                {
                                                      $this->Security->reset_p( $value , '' );
                                                }
                                          }
                                    }
                              }
                              
                              $this->process_success_messages();
                        }
                        else
                        {
                              if( $this->section_exists( 'error_func' ) )
                              {
                                    $FuncName = $this->get_section( 'error_func' );
                                    $NewFunc = create_function( 
                                          '$OwnerObject , $Options' , 'return( $Owner->'.$FuncName.'( $Options ) );'
                                    );
                                    $NewFunc( $Owner , $Options );
                              }
                              else
                              {
                                    $NewFunc = create_function( 
                                          '$OwnerObject' , 'return( _std_error_message( "'.$this->Security->ErrorMessage.'" ) );'
                                    );
                                    $NewFunc( $Owner );
                                    $this->Trace->add_trace_string( 
                                          "{lang:_std_error_message} : ".$this->Security->ErrorMessage , COMMON
                                    );
                                    $this->Trace->end_group();
                                    
                                    return( false );
                              }
                        }
                        
                        $this->Trace->add_trace_string( "{lang:state_was_processed}" , COMMON );
                        $this->Trace->end_group();
                        return( true );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

                              $this->Trace->add_trace_string( "{lang:call_params_filter} : $CallParamsFilter" , COMMON );

Definition at line 819 of file context.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        if( $this->section_exists( 'custom_validation_func' ) )
                        {
                              if( $this->section_exists( 'custom_validation_package_name' ) )
                              {
                                    if( $this->section_exists( 'custom_validation_package_version' ) )
                                    {
                                          $Version = $this->get_section( 'custom_validation_package_version' );
                                    }
                                    else
                                    {
                                          $Version = 'last';
                                    }
                                    
                                    $PackageName = $this->get_section( 'custom_validation_package_name' );
                                    
                                    $ValidationObject = get_package( $PackageName , $Version , __FILE__ );
                              }
                              else
                              {
                                    $ValidationObject = $Owner;
                              }

                              $CustomValidationFunc = $this->get_section( 'custom_validation_func' );
                              
                              if( call_user_func( array( $ValidationObject , $CustomValidationFunc ) , $Options ) === false )
                              {
                                    $TraceString = "{lang:custom_validation_func_not_passed} : $CustomValidationFunc";
                                    
                                    $this->Trace->add_trace_string( $TraceString , COMMON );
                                    
                                    $this->Trace->end_group();
                                    
                                    return( false );
                              }
                        }

                        return( true );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }

                              $this->Trace->add_trace_string( "{lang:get_post_filter} : $GetPostFilter" , COMMON );

            {
                  try
                  {
                        if( $this->section_exists( 'success_message' ) )
                        {
                              if( $this->Security->get_s( 'direct_controller' , 'integer' , 0 ) === 0 )
                              {
                                    $SuccessMessage = $this->get_section( 'success_message' );
                                    $PageName = $this->Security->get_gp( 'page_name' , 'command' );
                                    
                                    $this->Security->reset_s( "$PageName:success_message" , $SuccessMessage );
                              }
                              
                              $this->PageComposer->add_success_message( $this->get_section( 'success_message' ) );
                        }
                        
                        if( $this->section_exists( 'global_success_message' ) )
                        {
                              $SuccessMessage = $this->get_section( 'global_success_message' );
                              
                              if( $this->Security->get_s( 'direct_controller' , 'integer' , 0 ) === 0 )
                              {
                                    $this->Security->reset_s( 'success_message' , $SuccessMessage );
                              }
                              
                              $this->PageComposer->add_success_message( $SuccessMessage );
                        }
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
